summary: Build a separate Maui Lane Care Home application by closely copying the Moritz Care Home application's layout, UI, and details, on the existing ICP canister (Motoko) + React (Vite) scaffold with Internet Identity.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister scaffold
existing_features.description: Backend canister structure with main entrypoint and supporting modules wired for the application.

existing_features.title: Authorization & access control (Motoko)
existing_features.description: Backend authorization layer implementing access control logic for protected operations.

existing_features.title: React (Vite) frontend scaffold with app layout
existing_features.description: Frontend application shell including layout, navigation structure, shared loading/error states, and Tailwind styling.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication integration
existing_features.description: Frontend authentication hooks and UI for Internet Identity login and session handling; actor wiring to backend.

existing_features.title: Protected-access UX (Access Denied screen)
existing_features.description: Frontend handling for unauthorized access scenarios with a dedicated access denied screen.

existing_features.title: Profile setup modal
existing_features.description: Frontend modal flow to guide users through initial profile setup after authentication.

existing_features.title: Core application pages
existing_features.description: Implemented initial route pages for core sections of the app (home, announcements, facilities, residents, profile).

existing_features.title: Generated brand assets (icon, logo, hero)
existing_features.description: Generated static PNG assets for app icon, logo, and hero banner included in the frontend public assets.

existing_features.title: Build/deploy template and tooling
existing_features.description: Project build template including Docker/deploy scripts, ICP configuration, and frontend build tooling/scripts (e.g., image processing).

existing_features.title: Shadcn UI component library included
existing_features.description: Shadcn UI component set added to the frontend codebase for consistent UI primitives.

existing_features.title: Maui Lane Care Home branded app shell + navigation
existing_features.description: Introduced Maui-specific application shell and navigation components and wired them into the React app, using the generated Maui Lane brand assets in the authenticated experience.

existing_features.title: Moritz reference capture route + missing-reference placeholder
existing_features.description: Added a dedicated reference-capture page/route and a placeholder UI that documents what Moritz reference screenshots/pages are needed when references have not been provided.

existing_features.title: Maui dashboard page (authenticated)
existing_features.description: Added an initial Maui-specific dashboard page under the Maui route set, intended to mirror the Moritz app structure within the protected/authenticated experience.

existing_features.title: Maui residents directory UI (dashboard/grid with filtering + KPIs)
existing_features.description: Implemented Maui-specific residents UI components including a resident dashboard header, KPI row, status tabs, filter/sort bar, and responsive resident card/grid rendering backed by mock resident data and list utilities.

existing_features.title: Maui resident profile page (detail view) with mock profile + medications data
existing_features.description: Added a Maui-specific resident profile/detail page with supporting mock profile and medication datasets to complement the residents directory and enable navigation to an individual resident view prior to backend integration.

existing_features.title: Maui residents add/edit resident dialogs (UI-only, mock wiring)
existing_features.description: Added Maui residents module dialogs for adding a new resident and editing resident information, matching the intended Moritz-style UI patterns; currently frontend-only with mock/non-persistent behavior pending backend integration.

existing_features.title: Implement working print functionality from the Maui resident profile page so that clicking the existing “Print” button generates a printout that follows the layout and structure shown in the uploaded reference image (print.JPG).

Add print-specific styling so the Resident Profile report paginates cleanly and remains readable when printed (A4/Letter), including consistent typography, spacing, section dividers, and table formatting aligned with the uploaded reference image.

new_feature_requests.summary: Recreate an exact copy of the Moritz Care Home application (layout, UI, and details) as a separate application branded for Maui Lane Care Home.

Create a separate application experience branded as “Maui Lane Care Home” that closely recreates the Moritz Care Home application’s layout, UI, and on-screen details, using the existing React + Motoko + Internet Identity template as the foundation.
Ensure any Moritz-specific data labels, placeholders, and UI copy are replaced with Maui Lane Care Home equivalents while keeping the same UI structure as the Moritz reference.

Maintain compatibility with existing Internet Identity authentication and protected-access UX (do not remove or bypass login gating); the Maui Lane Care Home UI should appear within the authenticated experience where applicable.
Enable printing functionality (print view/layout) matching the provided reference image.

architectural_notes: Architecture: ICP canister app with Motoko backend + React (Vite) frontend.
Authentication: Internet Identity used on the frontend; actor-based calls to backend canister.
Authorization: Backend access-control module enforces permissions; frontend includes AccessDenied UX.
UI stack: Tailwind CSS + shadcn-ui component library.
Build/deploy: Includes Docker/deploy scripts and ICP config; image resize/prune scripts for generated assets.
Frontend: Maui-specific app shell/navigation components (MauiAppShell/MauiNav) layered on the existing React+II scaffold.
Frontend: Added Moritz reference-capture route and MissingReferencePlaceholder guidance screen for missing UI reference materials.
Frontend: Maui residents module built from composable components (ResidentGrid/Card/Header/KPIs/Tabs/FilterSort) with mock data + list utilities as a stand-in for backend integration.
Frontend: Added Maui resident profile/detail page with supporting mock profile + medications data modules as a stand-in for backend detail endpoints.
Frontend: Added Maui residents add/edit dialogs (AddNewResidentDialog/EditResidentInformationDialog) as UI-only components pending backend persistence/integration.
projectName: Recreate Moritz Care Home UI as a separate Maui Lane Care Home application
